sentences.sContent: But a programmer worked out how to do this for Microsoft a year ago.
sentences.sCn: 不过一名程序员一年前就知道怎么为微软做到这点。

sentences.sContent: This has served me well in my analyst/programmer jobs over the years.
sentences.sCn: 这一点对我这些年的分析师/程序员工作很有帮助。

sentences.sContent: This element allows the programmer to take a set of nodes, group it by some criteria, and then process each group formed by that selection process.
sentences.sCn: 这个元素允许程序员获取一组节点，按某些标准来进行分组，然后处理由那一选择过程组成的每一个组。

phrases.pCn: n. 计算机程序设计员

words.tran: 设计，规划；编制程序，[计] 程序编制
编程序；安排节目；设计电脑程式
用程序指令；为…制订计划；为…安排节目

trans.tranOther: someone whose job is to write computer programs
